title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: When appending multiple lines to the StyledText in word wrap mode, the entire client area is being redrawn for each line added.
OB: When appending N lines to the StyledText in word wrap mode, N redraws of the entire client area occur.
SR: To observe the redraws, add the following line to the performPaint method of StyledText: System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
